body:
i'm thankful that i woke up a little early and will have time, after i send this, to have a short run before i go to my training.

i'm thankful that i work from home and most days don't have to leave the house in the morning or really any time at all.

i'm thankful that yesterday a coworker told me he had been following my work on a new component and that it was cool and impressive to watch, which made me feel good, since i constantly feel inadequate inexperienced and like i'm flailing.

i'm thankful that d volunteered at a women in tech event, even though that meant we didn't get to have dinner together. 

i'm thankful for utorrent's new web app and its streaming capabilities, which are magical.

i'm thankful that i had three kinds of fruit (banana, blackberry, freeze-dried strawberry) in my special k this morning.

i'm thankful that my coworker chose disney princesses for each of our team members and decided i was belle because i'm adventurous and well read.
normalized_markdown:
i'm thankful that i woke up a little early and will have time, after i send this, to have a short run before i go to my training.

i'm thankful that i work from home and most days don't have to leave the house in the morning or really any time at all.

i'm thankful that yesterday a coworker told me he had been following my work on a new component and that it was cool and impressive to watch, which made me feel good, since i constantly feel inadequate inexperienced and like i'm flailing.

i'm thankful that d volunteered at a women in tech event, even though that meant we didn't get to have dinner together. 

i'm thankful for utorrent's new web app and its streaming capabilities, which are magical.

i'm thankful that i had three kinds of fruit (banana, blackberry, freeze-dried strawberry) in my special k this morning.

i'm thankful that my coworker chose disney princesses for each of our team members and decided i was belle because i'm adventurous and well read.
